text: B. aurea may refer to: * Bartonia aurea, an ornamental plant species * Bellastraea aurea, a sea snail species * Blakistonia aurea, a spider species in the genus Blakistonia found in South Australia * Brugmansia aurea, a plant species endemic to Ecuador ==Synonyms== * Bambusa aurea, a synonym for Phyllostachys aurea, a bamboo species ==See also== * Aurea (disambiguation)
title: B. aurea
